00001 #ifndef HCAL_TILE_INDEX_HH
00002 #define HCAL_TILE_INDEX_HH 1
00003 
00004 //#define HTI_MOD_MASK  0x0000003F
00005 #define HTI_MOD_MASK  0x0000001F //for EPT Prototype
00006 //#define HTI_CHIP_MASK 0x000007C0
00007 #define HTI_CHIP_MASK 0x000003C0 //for EPT Prototype
00008 //#define HTI_CHAN_MASK 0x0000F800
00009 #define HTI_CHAN_MASK 0x0000FC00 //for EPT Prototype
00010 #define HTI_SIPM_MASK 0xFFFF0000
00011 
00012 #define HTI_MOD_SHIFT   0
00013 #define HTI_CHIP_SHIFT  6
00014 //#define HTI_CHAN_SHIFT 11
00015 #define HTI_CHAN_SHIFT 10 //for EPT Prototype
00016 #define HTI_SIPM_SHIFT 16
00017 
00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <sstream>
00020 
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 
00023 #include "EncodingStringHelper.hh"
00024 
00025 namespace CALICE {
00039 class HcalTileIndex{
00040  public:
00043   HcalTileIndex(){
00044     setModule(0).setChip(0).setChannel(0).setSipm(0);
00045   }
00046 
00049   HcalTileIndex(int index){
00050     _index = index;
00051   }
00052 
00060   HcalTileIndex(short mod, short chip, short chan) : _index(0) {
00061     setModule(mod).setChip(chip).setChannel(chan).setSipm(0);
00062   }
00063 
00071   HcalTileIndex(short mod, short chip, short chan, short sipm){
00072     setModule(mod).setChip(chip).setChannel(chan).setSipm(sipm);
00073   }
00074 
00077   ~HcalTileIndex(){};
00078 
00081   unsigned short getModule() const {
00082     return (_index & HTI_MOD_MASK) >> HTI_MOD_SHIFT;
00083   }
00084 
00087   unsigned short getModuleType() const {
00088 
00089     // module numbering starts at 1, always return type 0 for invalid
00090     // modules
00091     if(getModule() == 0) return 0;
00092 
00093     short type = 0;
00094     if ( getChip() > 5 ) ++type;        //  lower part
00095     if ( getModule() > 30 ) type += 2;  //  coarse modules
00096     return type;
00097   }
00098 
00101   unsigned short getChip() const {
00102     return (_index & HTI_CHIP_MASK) >> HTI_CHIP_SHIFT;
00103   }
00104 
00107   unsigned short getChannel() const {
00108     return (_index & HTI_CHAN_MASK) >> HTI_CHAN_SHIFT;
00109   }
00110   
00113   unsigned short getSipm() const {
00114     return (_index & HTI_SIPM_MASK) >> HTI_SIPM_SHIFT;
00115   }
00116 
00119   unsigned int getIndex() const {
00120     return _index;
00121   }
00122 
00125   HcalTileIndex& setModule(short mod){
00126     _index = (_index & ~HTI_MOD_MASK) | ((mod << HTI_MOD_SHIFT) & HTI_MOD_MASK);
00127     return (*this);
00128   }
00129 
00132   HcalTileIndex& setChip(short chip){
00133     _index = (_index & ~HTI_CHIP_MASK) | ((chip << HTI_CHIP_SHIFT) & HTI_CHIP_MASK);
00134     return (*this);
00135   }
00136 
00139   HcalTileIndex& setChannel(short chan){
00140     _index = (_index & ~HTI_CHAN_MASK) | ((chan << HTI_CHAN_SHIFT) & HTI_CHAN_MASK);
00141     return (*this);
00142   }
00143 
00146   HcalTileIndex& setSipm(short sipm){
00147     _index = (_index & ~HTI_SIPM_MASK) | ((sipm << HTI_SIPM_SHIFT) & HTI_SIPM_MASK);
00148     return (*this);
00149   }
00150 
00153   static std::string getEncodingString(const unsigned int startbit) {
00154     
00155     std::ostringstream EncodingString;
00156   
00157     EncodingString << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("module",  HTI_MOD_MASK,  HTI_MOD_SHIFT, startbit)
00158                    << "," 
00159                    << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("chip",    HTI_CHIP_MASK, HTI_CHIP_SHIFT, startbit)
00160                    << ","
00161                    << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("channel", HTI_CHAN_MASK, HTI_CHAN_SHIFT, startbit)
00162                    << ","
00163                    << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("SiPM",    HTI_SIPM_MASK, HTI_SIPM_SHIFT, startbit);
00164   
00165     return EncodingString.str();
00166   
00167   }
00168 
00169 
00170 
00171  protected:
00172   unsigned int _index;
00173 
00174  private:
00175 
00176 };

00178 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, 
00179                          const CALICE::HcalTileIndex& hti) {
00180 
00181   out << "module: " << hti.getModule()
00182       << " chip: " << hti.getChip()
00183       << " channel: " << hti.getChannel()
00184     //        << " SiPM: " << hti.getSipm()
00185     ;
00186 
00187   return out;
00188 
00189 }
